thread.title: BRIEF-Contango Oil & Gas Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.04

title: BRIEF-Contango Oil & Gas Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.04
text:
May 4, 2018 / 1:12 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Contango Oil & Gas Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.04 Reuters Staff
May 4 (Reuters) - Contango Oil & Gas Co:
* CONTANGO ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES OPERATIONAL UPDATE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04
* Q1 REVENUE $20.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $20.4 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.16 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* PRODUCTION FOR Q1 WAS ABOUT 4.5 BCFE, OR 50.0 MMCFE PER DAY, VERSUS 57.6 MMCFE PER DAY FOR Q1 OF 2017
* SEES Q2 PRODUCTION 41,000 MCFE PER DAY TO 46,000 MCFE PER DAY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
